cred.success: Verification Successful! The digital signature associated with this record as signed by the issuer has been cryptographically validated.

home.beta: This project is in the beta stage
home.title: Ontario's Verifiable Businesses
home.message: This service allows you to search for registrations, certificates, licenses, or permits that an Ontario business may have, and verify authenticity of each using Distributed Ledger Technology (blockchain). The service is currently offered in beta mode, with all the records sourced from Ontario Business Registration System, Ontario's official record of information on business entities and not-for-profit organizations operating in Ontario.

topic.doing_business_as: Business Name registered by a corporation

business_type.ONBIS_BUSINESS_TYPE_AN: Business Name registered by a corporation

business_status.ONBIS_BUSINESS_STATUS_A: Cancelled for failure to comply with the Ontario Securities Act
business_status.ONBIS_BUSINESS_STATUS_K: Cancelled - section 240 Business Corporations Act or 317(1) Corporations Act & need special act to revive
business_status.ONBIS_BUSINESS_STATUS_B: Cancelled for failure to comply with the Corporations Tax Act
business_status.ONBIS_BUSINESS_STATUS_U: Cancelled for failure to comply with Ministry of Finance tax statute
business_status.ONBIS_BUSINESS_STATUS_C: Cancelled for default - section 241 Business Corporations Act or section 317(9) Corporations Act
business_status.ONBIS_BUSINESS_STATUS_W: Dissolved - Credit Unions and Caisses Populaires Act
business_status.ONBIS_BUSINESS_STATUS_G: Extra-Provincial Domestic Corporation - no longer operating in Ontario
business_status.ONBIS_BUSINESS_STATUS_E: Extra-Provincial - no longer operating in Ontario
business_status.ONBIS_BUSINESS_STATUS_7: Transferred to Ontario from another jurisdiction
business_status.ONBIS_BUSINESS_STATUS_5: In default - Ministry of Finance tax statute

MGCS: Ministry of Government and Consumer Services
